dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4850 IH: Endangered Species Recovery Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hageman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To rename the Endangered Species Act of 1973, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Endangered Species Recovery Act of 2025.

section.header: Renaming of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to the Endangered Species Recovery Act

subsection.text: The first section of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1531 note; Public Law 93â€“205) is amended by striking may be cited as the Endangered Species Act of 1973 and inserting may be cited as the Endangered Species Recovery Act.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the Endangered Species Act of 1973 shall be deemed to be a reference to the Endangered Species Recovery Act.
